lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In response, Martin said he did not view IBM as a threat to DEC, nor DEC as a threat to IBM, because both companies were catering largely to existing customer bases, rather than stealing market share from one another.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "There will be increasing momentum in earnings, albeit not until later this year," Martin said at a technology conference sponsored by the investment firm.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Instead, aspects of the computer were integrated into the IBM 9370 machine introduced last year, and other aspects should be unwrapped by 1988, Martin said.

lst.name: sentence
